fxInfo_label: Lower chamber election vote share of second-largest vote-getter
fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Leave this question blank if election was nonpartisan, i.e., no parties (not even pro-government parties) were allowed.
fxInfo_question: In this election to the lower (or unicameral) chamber of the legislature, what percentage(%) of the vote was received by the second largest party in the first/only round?
fxInfo_sources: Nohlen et al. (1999, 2002, 2005, 2010); Chronicle of Parliamentary Elections (IPU).
name: v2ellovtsm
